scripts.info.txt: bash -c "TZ=UTC steamctl depot info --app 238960 --depot 238961 | tail --lines=+2 | tee steam-depot-info-new.txt"
scripts.info.txt:mv: bash -c "mv --force --no-target-directory steam-depot-info.txt steam-depot-info-old.txt && mv --force --no-target-directory steam-depot-info-new.txt steam-depot-info.txt"
scripts.fetch:query: bash -c "yarn info.txt && diff steam-depot-info.txt steam-depot-info-new.txt && echo \"ggpk is up to date.\""
